thread.title: Jennifer Lopez, Lady GaGa, Kate Hudson Attend 'Rock the Kasbah' Premiere
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez, Lady GaGa, Kate Hudson Attend 'Rock the Kasbah' Premiere

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jennifer Lopez, Lady GaGa, Kate Hudson Attend 'Rock the Kasbah' Premiere
text:
Comments J.Lo brings boyfriend Casper Smart while GaGa supports her fiance Taylor Kinney at the special screening in the Big Apple. 
" Rock the Kasbah " premiere in New York became a star-studded affair. Hollywood beauties like Jennifer Lopez , Lady GaGa , Kate Hudson , and Zooey Deschanel flocked to AMC Loews Lincoln Square for the special screening on Monday. J.Lo hit the black carpet on October 19 in black trousers and a turtleneck crop top that showed her midriff. She finished off her look with a winter coat by MaxMara and dark-rimmed glasses. She was accompanied by her dancer boyfriend Casper Smart . The Mother Monster, meanwhile, supported her fiance, Taylor Kinney , who stars in the film. The couple packed on PDA for the photographers. She added color to the event with her red Marc Jacobs dress while her beau donned a t-shirt and tux. On the other hand, cast member Hudson glammed up with her backless metallic Balmain gown that hugged her figure like a glove. Co-star Deschanel opted for a black form-fitting dress. They were joined by Bill Murray and Bruce Willis . The film will arrive in the United States on October 23. It follows rock manager Richie Lanz who is left in Kabul, Afghanistan by his last remaining client. While trying to find his way home, he befriends a band of misfits and discovers a young girl with an extraordinary voice.
